title: Urgent - Help to identify the font of this logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416032918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/intercool_LOGO_to_typography_search_3607.png)

I assumed that is it arial black but i've noticed some differences in capital E and L. Can anyone help please?
author: desi87

comments.content: Move to: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416032918/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid"), for answer to this type request.
